  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_78601</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78601</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Processor response to a voltage input</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozessorantwort zu einem Spannung Input</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réponse de processeur à une entrée de tension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resposta do processador a uma entrada da tensão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risposta del processor ad un input di tensione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απάντηση επεξεργαστών σε μια είσοδο τάσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Respuesta del procesador a una entrada de 
información del voltaje</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the response of a processor or logic gate to a voltage input. The processor treats a voltage input below 2.5 volts as off (or 0, or low) and above 2.5 volts as on (or 1, or high).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electronic control system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">logic gate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">processor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sensor circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">voltage input</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt die Antwort eines 
Prozessors oder Logikgatter zu einem Spannung Input. Der 
Prozessor behandelt eine Spannung, die so unter 2.5 Volt eingegeben 
wird weg (oder 0 oder niedrig) und über weg 2.5 Volt wie an (oder von
1 oder hoch).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre la réponse d'un 
processeur ou la porte de logique à une entrée de tension. Le 
processeur traite une tension entrée en-dessous de 2.5 volts aussi 
outre (ou de 0, ou bas) et au-dessus de 2.5 volts qu'en fonction (ou 
de 1, ou haut).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra a resposta de um 
processador ou a porta da lógica a uma entrada da tensão. O 
processador trata uma tensão input abaixo de 2.5 volts tão fora (ou 
de 0, ou baixo) e acima de 2.5 volts quanto sobre (ou de 1, ou 
elevado).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra la risposta di un 
processor o il cancello di logica ad un input di tensione. Il 
processor tratta una tensione immessa inferiore a 2.5 volt così fuori
di (o a 0, o basso) e superiore a 2.5 volt quanto sopra (o a 1, o 
alto).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει την 
απάντηση ενός επεξεργαστή ή μιας πύλης λογικής σε μια είσοδο 
τάσης. Ο επεξεργαστής μεταχειρίζεται μια τάση που εισάγεται
κάτω από 2,5 βολτ τόσο από (ή 0, ή χαμηλός) και επάνω 
από 2,5 βολτ όπως επάνω (ή 1, ή υψηλός).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra la respuesta de un 
procesador o la puerta de la lógica a una entrada de información del
voltaje. El procesador trata un voltaje entrado debajo de 2.5 
voltios tan (o de 0, o bajo) y sobre de 2.5 voltios como encendido (o 
de 1, o alto).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektronisches Steuersystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Logikgatter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozessor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sensor-Stromkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spannung Input</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système de commande électronique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">porte de logique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">processeur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">circuit de capteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">entrée de tension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema de controle eletrônico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">porta da lógica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">processador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">circuito do sensor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">entrada da tensão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema di controllo elettronico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cancello di logica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">processor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">circuito del sensore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">input di tensione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρονικό σύστημα ελέγχου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πύλη λογικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επεξεργαστής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύκλωμα αισθητήρων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είσοδος τάσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sistema de control electrónico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">puerta de la lógica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">procesador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">circuito del sensor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">entrada de información del voltaje</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
